#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	/* code */
	//input the number of test Cases
	int testCases;
	cin >> testCases;
	//read of process all test cases one by one
	int radius;
	double length;
	while (testCases--) {
		cin >> radius;
		length = sqrt(2)*radius;
		cout << fixed  << setprecision(6) << length << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
